summary: A brief email or note from July 24, 2019, concerning a psychological assessment or follow-up for an individual (likely Jeffrey Epstein) at the Metropolitan Correctional Center in New York. The document references a recent 'incident' and suggests coordination with a chief psychologist.

keyFacts: The document is dated July 24, 2019, the day after Jeffrey Epstein was found injured in his cell.
It references a psychological assessment ('SRA') conducted on July 23, 2019, for an inmate, strongly suggesting it pertains to Epstein.
The correspondence involves the Chief Psychologist of the Federal Bureau of Prisons at the Metropolitan Correctional Center in New York.
The text discusses coordinating care for the inmate following an 'incident', which aligns with the timeline of Epstein's reported suicide attempt or injury on July 23, 2019.
